page.title: 08HOTELS-THE GOLF
page.content: The Golf Hotel is often used by people who play golf on the nearby course.It is a large and beautiful half timbered building set in vast gardens.It is within easy reach of the village and a large number of local historic buildings.The Golf Hotel was sold for over half a million pounds in 1984 and it is now one of the most famous hotels in Lincolnshire.The golf course itself is officially rated among the twenty best courses in the world and it often hosts major competitions.The Golf Hotel contains all the facilities expected of a major hotel.
